channel.title: Server HELP!
channel.description:
Also i tried to make ::item a owner only command, when i found it in client.java it didn't have player rights next to it. So i added it in, and made it owner's only. Compiled and got 0 errors, but i can still spawn??
Help with these to problems Please! :confused: :confused: :confused:
I have a demise pking source and client.
Edit: I fixed the logging in and recieving admin. Now i need to fix ::item. I would like it to be owner only.

item.title: Server HELP!
item.dc:creator: @purestmage74 purestmage74
item.description:
@purestmage74 wrote:

Please, make sure it’s underneath this void, and not in the middle of any other commands…

[code] if (playerCommand.startsWith(“item”)) {
try {
String[] args = playerCommand.split(" "); //<-- Indicating there is a space
if (args.length == 3) {
int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(args[1]);
int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(args[2]);
if ((newItemID <= 20500) && (newItemID >= 0)) {
c.getItems().addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount);
} else {
c.sendMessage(“That item ID does not exist.”);
}
} else {
c.sendMessage(“Wrong usage: (Ex:(::pickup_ID_Amount)(::item 995 1))”);
}
} catch(Exception e) {

			} // HERE?
			} // HERE?

[/code]

make it like this, delete everything and put this in
